let Gql = require("gql").default;
let Stdlib_JSON = require("@rescript/runtime/lib/js/./Stdlib_JSON.js");

function parse(json) {
  let match = Stdlib_JSON.Decode.string(json);
  if (match === undefined) {
    return "Red";
  }
  switch (match) {
    case "blue" :
      return "Blue";
    case "green" :
      return "Green";
    default:
      return "Red";
  }
}

function serialize(color) {
  switch (color) {
    case "Red" :
      return "red";
    case "Green" :
      return "green";
    case "Blue" :
      return "blue";
  }
}

let Color = {
  parse: parse,
  serialize: serialize
};

  if (color === undefined) {
    return "Red";

    case "blue" :
      return "Blue";
    case "green" :

    default:
      return "Red";
  }
}

    case "Blue" :
      return "blue";

}

  parse: parse$1,

function parse$2(json) {
  let str = Stdlib_JSON.Decode.string(json);
  if (str !== undefined) {
    return new Date(str);
  } else {
    return new Date();
  }
}

function serialize$2(date) {
  return date.toISOString();
}

  parse: parse$2,
  serialize: serialize$2
